translated: Elder Story🔽The Chapter about the Giver of Protection
he lived in a fine house.
and his voice was very loud,
Having heard the sound of the announcement
I bowed to the Leader of the World.
I did not know the destination of that perception;
I do not know of a bad destination,
this is the fruit of the perception of the Buddha.
I have done what the Buddha asked.”

original: Itthaṁ sudaṁ āyasmā saddasaññako thero imā gāthāyo abhāsitthāti.
analyzed: ittham sudam āyasmā saddasaññakaḥ theraḥ imāḥ gāthāyaḥ abhāsittha ati
translated: Thus the elder Saddasaññaka recited these verses.
